interest.startSaving: Start saving careers that interst you.

discoverOpportunitiesDesc: Learn about the career opportunities and educational benefits available to McDonald's restaurant employees.

instruction on how to reset

unableToFindEmail: We're unable to find that email address in our system. Please try again or sign up for an account.
archwayToOpportunitiesDesc: Learn how McDonald's helps eligible restaurant employees archive their goal.
careerIndustryDesc: These careers may be in reach with time, experience, and education
archwayDesc: Learn how McDonald's helps eligible restaurant employees achieve their goals.

discover.question1: Working with your hand, physical and outdoor activities, building or fixing things
discover.question1Desc: Like building with blocks, fixing a flat tire, or preparing food
discover.question2: Exploring, figuring out how thing work, or solving problem
discover.question2Desc: Like doing puzzle, troubleshooting a computer issue, or finding a new approach to a common issue.
discover.question3: Express your idea through art, music, theater, film, or writing
discover.question3Desc: Like playing or recording music, creating social media posts, or designing a beautiful space
discover.question4: Helping people by advising, coaching or teaching
discover.question4Desc: Like leading a group activity, supporting a friend through tough time, or training new team members
discover.question5Desc: Like debating a topic, motivating people to reach their goals, or encouraging a customer to try new items.
discover.question6: Planing activities, organizing things, or managing details
discover.question6Desc: Like planing a party, managing a team's work schedule, or keeping track of supplies.

workStyle.sameAnswerTitle: Hmm, it looks like we have the same response on every answer!
workStyle.sameAnswerDesc1: So that you can get the best results, try varying your answers (staying true to yourself!) so we can get a better idea of your work style.

searchNoResult: Your search does not match any results.
searchNoResultDesc: Try again or enter a different city or zipcode.
